headline: B.C. launches short-term rental registry with annual fees to rein in 'speculators'
summary: VANCOUVER — British Columbia is launching a registry for short-term rentals to further crack down on speculators operating illegally, said Housing Minister Ravi Kahlon.The provincewide registry...
